Blacklist.label: Blacklist
Blacklist.tooltip: Comma separated list of users not to attack.

WrongUserText.value: Sorry {user}, the "{command}" command belongs to {owner}. If you'd like your own personal command you can unlock one at Lv 50!
WrongUserText.label: Wrong User Text
WrongUserText.tooltip: Text to reply with if another user tries to use a user's command.
